storage/lmgr/Makefile - pgsql17devel-backend

  1. #-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2. #
  3. # Makefile--
  4. #    Makefile for storage/lmgr
  5. #
  6. # IDENTIFICATION
  7. #    src/backend/storage/lmgr/Makefile
  8. #
  9. #-------------------------------------------------------------------------

  11. subdir = src/backend/storage/lmgr
  12. top_builddir = ../../../..
  13. include $(top_builddir)/src/Makefile.global

  15. OBJS = \
  16.     condition_variable.o \
  17.     deadlock.o \
  18.     lmgr.o \
  19.     lock.o \
  20.     lwlock.o \
  21.     predicate.o \
  22.     proc.o \
  23.     s_lock.o \
  24.     spin.o

  26. include $(top_srcdir)/src/backend/common.mk

  28. ifdef TAS
  29. TASPATH = $(top_builddir)/src/backend/port/tas.o
  30. endif

  32. s_lock_test: s_lock.c $(top_builddir)/src/common/libpgcommon.a $(top_builddir)/src/port/libpgport.a
  33.     $(CC) $(CPPFLAGS) $(CFLAGS) -DS_LOCK_TEST=1 $(srcdir)/s_lock.c \
  34.         $(TASPATH) -L $(top_builddir)/src/common -lpgcommon \
  35.         -L $(top_builddir)/src/port -lpgport -lm -o s_lock_test

  37. lwlocknames.h: ../../../include/storage/lwlocklist.h ../../utils/activity/wait_event_names.txt generate-lwlocknames.pl
  38.     $(PERL) $(srcdir)/generate-lwlocknames.pl $^

  40. check: s_lock_test
  41.     ./s_lock_test

  43. clean:
  44.     rm -f s_lock_test
  45.     rm -f lwlocknames.h
